mapper.select: select admin_id as id, admin_status as status from admin_info where admin_id = #{id} and admin_pwd = #{pwd}
select count(*) = 1 from admin_info where admin_id = #{id}
select admin_id as id, admin_status as status from admin_info where admin_seq = #{adminNo}
mapper.update: update admin_info set admin_status = #{status} where admin_seq = #{adminNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teacher_info(teacher_id, teacher_pwd, teacher_name, teacher_img) VALUES(#{id},#{pwd},#{name},#{imageFile});
mapper.select: select count(*) = 1 from teacher_info where teacher_id = #{teacherId}
select count(*) from teacher_info where teacher_name like '%${keyword}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class_info (class_name, class_grade, class_days, class_opendt, class_closedt, class_starttime, class_endtime, class_teacher_seq) VALUES(#{name},#{grade},#{days},#{opendt},#{closedt},#{starttime},#{endtime},#{teacherNo})
mapper.select: select class_seq as no, class_name as title, class_grade as grade, class_days as days, class_opendt as opendt, class_closedt as closedt, class_starttime as starttime, class_endtime as endtime, class_teacher_seq as teacher from class_info where class_seq = #{no}
select count(*) from class_detail_view where title like '%${keyword}%' where teacher like '%${keyword}%'
select * from class_detail_view where title like '%${keyword}%' where teacher like '%${keyword}%' order by seq teacher opendt closedt ${order} limit 10 offset #{offset};
